title: ACEB Launches New Certification Program for Circular Economy Professionals
excerpt: We are excited to announce the launch of our comprehensive three-level certification program designed to enhance professional skills in circular economy practices.
content: The new certification program offers three distinct levels of professional development, from foundational knowledge to expert-level expertise in circular economy implementation.

title: Partnership with Leading Balkans Universities Announced
excerpt: ACEB has established strategic partnerships with five leading universities across the Balkans region to integrate circular economy curriculum into their programs.
content: This partnership will help educate the next generation of professionals in sustainable economic practices.

title: First Annual Circular Economy Summit Successfully Concluded
excerpt: Over 200 professionals from across the region gathered in Belgrade for our inaugural summit focusing on sustainable business practices and circular economy innovation.
content: The summit featured keynote speakers from leading international organizations and showcased successful circular economy implementations.

title: New Research Report: Circular Economy Opportunities in the Western Balkans
excerpt: Our latest research identifies key opportunities and challenges for circular economy adoption across Western Balkan countries.
content: The comprehensive report analyzes current practices and provides recommendations for policy makers and business leaders.

title: ACEB Welcomes 100th Certified Member
excerpt: We celebrate a significant milestone as ACEB welcomes its 100th certified circular economy professional to our growing network.
content: This achievement demonstrates the growing interest and commitment to circular economy practices in our region.

title: Collaboration with EU Green Deal Initiative
excerpt: ACEB has been selected to participate in the EU Green Deal initiative, supporting circular economy transition across Southeast Europe.
content: This collaboration will provide additional resources and expertise to accelerate circular economy adoption in the Balkans.
